Name: Ghost of Dragon
About the game: Ghost of Dragon is a semi-idle role-playing game. Players can build battle teams with unique heroes, flexible equipment, soul gems and powerful pets; the unique resident system provides players with great freedom for town management, whether it is forging equipment, capturing pets, refining soul gems, or collecting materials, players will have a much finer control over their idle play experience. Game Features 24 Hero Classes from 5 schools of elements: each class has a unique set of skill, tactic, and dedicated skill tree. Highly flexible itemization system: there are hundreds of different types of equipment with unique effects and rare magical enhancements. Players will be able to enhance, enchant and reforge equipment, to develop powerful builds. Monster capture: over a hundred of different types of pets can be captured in game. Each pet has its own unique set of talents and strengths. Pet talents can be transferred and mixed, giving players more freedom to create unique and powerful pet builds. Innovative resident system: players are free to arrange different professions of residents on a highly customizable working board. There are 7 professions of residents to choose from: Merchants are responsible for making profits; Blacksmiths forge various equipment; Chefs make dishes to provide benefits to other nearby residents; Doctors provide medical services for the town; Soul Refiners make soul gems; Bait Collectors, and Pet Catchers use bait to trap pets. High-quality residents have more powerful synergistic affixes, further strengthening the town's production income. In addition, there are many unique residents to collect, unique residents can bring significant and unique buffs to the town and expeditions. Real Time-Based Command battle system: During battles, heroes automatically perform actions when their skillsâ€™ Cooling-Down is ready, and players can unleash powerful tactics at any time by spending Chi. This frees players from micromanaging teams and allows fast paced and intense battle fights!
